metadata.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. For Wyll, you cannot romance if you have not learned about Mizora. He is enjoying himself, it would seem, and toasts you as you approach.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Wyll, I'd like you to join me in my bunk tonight.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I've thought about your offer, and I'm afraid I'm not interested.

38.speaker: Wyll
38.context: NodeContext: Player and Wyll are partners. He's horny.

21.speaker: Wyll
21.text: Don't keep me waiting, I beg you.
21.context: NodeContext: Player and Wyll are partners. He's horny.

45.speaker: Wyll
45.text: There they are - the hero themselves. Let us raise a glass!
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll holds a tankard of ale. He is about to propose a toast.NodeContext: Wyll holds a tankard of ale. He is about to propose a toast.

24.speaker: Wyll
24.text: To freedom from tyranny! May we hew a clear path for the downtrodden to travel.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll raises his gtlass to toast,NodeContext: Wyll raises his gtlass to toast,

83.speaker: Wyll
83.text: To you - a legend in the making.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll keeps his tankard raised.NodeContext: Wyll keeps his tankard raised.

56.speaker: Wyll
56.text: And to the Blade! Another wrong righted, another page written!
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankarad at the end of the line.NodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankarad at the end of the line.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: 'The Blade' would have very much failed on his own.

65.speaker: Wyll
65.text: Cheeky! But let's not sour the evening with talk of maybes and might-have-beens.

30.speaker: Wyll
30.text: Already, the bards are preparing their anthems, the poets their verses.

62.speaker: Wyll
62.text: Your name will be forever linked to the Blade of Frontiers. Could you have imagined such fortune a tenday ago?

60.speaker: Wyll
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll raises his glass once moreNodeContext: Wyll raises his glass once more

15.speaker: Player
15.text: 'Forever linked?' That isn't 'fortune' - that's a threat.

101.speaker: Wyll
101.text: Fuss all you want - this celebration is too sweet for you to sour it!

3.speaker: Wyll
3.text: Grab a tankard and suck down some ale. You've an edge in bad need of dulling.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Wyll, I thought you might want to join me in my bunk tonight...

94.speaker: Wyll
94.text: Ah. Well. An intriguing offer, truly, but - I just don't feel that kind of connection.

44.speaker: Wyll
44.text: But consider me flattered. A boon for my ego.
44.context: NodeContext: showing a bit of cheeky self-awareness.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: The Blade lives up to his myth!

51.speaker: Wyll
51.text: Oh, but the Blade is no myth, chief. Myths are tall tales, fleeting as Cormyrian rain.

48.speaker: Wyll
48.text: I'm as real as the heart that beats in your chest. Now go off, have your fun.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a drink after his line

87.speaker: Wyll
87.text: I've got a tankard keeping me company.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: We should really continue this conversation in my bed.

11.speaker: Wyll
11.text: Hmm - I'm not really feeling the connection.

100.speaker: Wyll
100.text: But consider me flattered. A boon for my ego.
100.context: NodeContext: showing a bit of cheeky self-awareness.

31.speaker: Wyll
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flirty. Wyll keeps his tankard raised.Wyll nods and winks  afterwardNodeContext: Flirty. Wyll keeps his tankard raised.

74.speaker: Wyll
74.text: May our bond only grow stronger.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flirty - with a wink and devious smile. Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Flirty - with a wink and devious smile. Wyll lowers his tankard.

71.speaker: Wyll
71.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. The Blade rarely seeks partnership...

61.speaker: Wyll
61.text: ... but the frontier provides few of life's creature comforts.

55.speaker: Wyll
55.text: I reckoned our union might extend to your bunk tonight.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: We should explore this bond in my bunk tonight.

33.speaker: Wyll
33.text: If I didn't know better, I'd think you were reading my mind.

57.speaker: Wyll
57.text: Meet you at your bunk when you're ready.

28.speaker: Wyll
28.text: I trust I won't have to wait long.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Are you coming on to me?

49.speaker: Wyll
49.text: I hadn't imagined myself so subtle. Or, to put it another way: yes.

36.speaker: Wyll
36.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. The Blade rarely seeks partnership...
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll taked a deep drink before speaking.

75.speaker: Wyll
75.text: ... but the frontier provides few of life's creature comforts.

25.speaker: Wyll
25.text: I reckoned our union might extend to your bunk tonight.

19.speaker: Wyll
19.text: Meet you at your bunk when you're ready.

88.speaker: Wyll
88.text: Of course, of course. Our future holds countless victories to celebrate.

89.speaker: Wyll
89.text: Of course, of course. Why complicate such a valuable friendship?

78.speaker: Player
78.text: We're only allies - and I'd like to keep it that way.

68.speaker: Wyll
68.text: Of course, of course. Why complicate such a valuable partnership?

102.speaker: Wyll
102.text: And to you and Astarion. May your stars burn ever bright.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

92.speaker: Wyll
92.text: Consider me jealous as a sisterless hag, then.

18.speaker: Wyll
18.text: Eh - go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Cool your blood. I'm not interested in you like that.

77.speaker: Wyll
77.text: It's a good thing I'm not jealous then.
77.context: NodeContext: He's such a bad liar.

42.speaker: Wyll
42.text: Go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company!

96.speaker: Player
96.text: It wouldn't matter one way or another.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: My mind isn't entirely made up. Perhaps you might join me instead.

76.speaker: Wyll
76.text: You do know how to set the Blade's heart all a-flutter.

91.speaker: Wyll
91.text: When the time comes to rest, just say the word and we'll meet at your bunk.

9.speaker: Wyll
9.text: Your heart beats strong, friend. I'm proud to fight at your side.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll taked a deep drink before speaking.

7.speaker: Wyll
7.text: Now go off, have your fun. I've got a tankard keeping me company.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: The Blade lives up to his myth!

80.speaker: Wyll
80.text: Oh, but the Blade is no myth, chief. Myths are tall tales, fleeting as Cormyrian rain.

35.speaker: Wyll
35.text: I'm as real as the heart that beats in your chest. Now go off, have your fun.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Takes a drink after his line

59.speaker: Wyll
59.text: I've got a tankard keeping me company.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You need to stay out of my business.

23.speaker: Wyll
23.text: Your business is plain as a dread pirate's pikestaff, chief.

4.speaker: Wyll
4.text: And to you and Gale. May your stars burn ever bright.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

63.speaker: Wyll
63.text: And to you and Karlach. May your stars burn ever bright.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

97.speaker: Wyll
97.text: And to you and Lae'zel. May your stars burn ever bright.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

26.speaker: Wyll
26.text: And to you and Shadowheart. May your stars burn ever bright.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

22.speaker: Wyll
22.text: And to you and your paramour. May your stars burn ever bright.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll lowers his tankard.NodeContext: Said with a heavy sigh, and a smidgen of jealousy. Wyll lowers his tankard after speaking the line.

47.speaker: Wyll
47.context: NodeContext: Wyll rejected player. He's contemplative.

99.speaker: Wyll
99.context: NodeContext: Player rejected Wyll. He's disappointed but kind.
